'''Brilliant Dawn''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 5.0]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/08/30 04:00 – 2024/09/18 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 5 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in on 7 days in total to receive Intertwined Fate ×10 and other rewards!
